 2024-12852024-12-05PS
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisReappointment of EVANS BÉDARD of Farnham, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Quebec Regional Division of the Parole Board of Canada and his designation as Vice-Chairperson of the Quebec Regional Division of the Parole Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of five years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of EVANS BÉDARD of Farnham, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Quebec Regional Division of the Parole Board of Canada and his designation as Vice-Chairperson of the Quebec Regional Division of the Parole Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of five years.
